measure.name: add_os_water_heater_mixed_storage_gas
measure.description: This measure adds a new residential gas storage water heater to the model based on user inputs. If there is already an existing residential water heater in the model, it is replaced.
measure.modeler_description: The measure will create a new instance of the OS:WaterHeater:Mixed object representing a gas storage water heater. The measure will be placed on the plant loop "Domestic Hot Water Loop". If this loop already exists, any water heater on that loop will be removed and replaced with a water heater consistent with this measure. If it doesn't exist, it will be created.

argument.name: storage_tank_volume
argument.display_name: Volume of the storage tank (gallons) of the gas water heater. Set to 'auto' to have volume autosized.

argument.name: water_heater_location
argument.display_name: Thermal zone where the water heater is located.

argument.name: water_heater_capacity
argument.display_name: The nominal capacity [kBtu/hr] of the gas storage water heater. Set to 'auto' to have this field autosized.

argument.name: rated_energy_factor
argument.display_name: Rated energy factor of gas storage water heater. Enter 'auto' for a water heater that meets the minimum federal efficiency requirements.

argument.name: water_heater_recovery_efficiency
argument.display_name: Rated recovery efficiency of the water heater. Enter a number between 0 and 1. This is used to calculate the thermal efficiency of the burner.

argument.name: offcyc_power
argument.display_name: Forced draft fan power of the water heater (W)

argument.name: oncyc_power
argument.display_name: Parasitic electricity power of the water heater (W)
